You can use mnemonic phrase to import wallet or scan QR code to import.\n\nYou reset wallet password while importing the Mnemonic Phrase

Keystore is file format for private keys[JSON].\n\n Copy and paste the Keystore content to input field, or scan the QR Code generated with Keystore’s information to import.
Keystore is the file format for private keys (JSON). Scan the Keystore QR code to import wallet

Mnemonic phrase can be used to recover your assets when you forget password, delete the app or lose your phone.
\n\nWe highly recommend that you write down the mnemonic phrase (Backup Phrase) on paper and keep it in a safe place, because anyone who gets it can access your assets.

Mnemonic phrase can be used to import wallet or reset wallet password. Anyone who has your mnemonic phrase can access all your assets directly, so please write it down on paper and keep it in a safe place.\n\n
Please write down your 12-word mnemonic phrase in the right order, we will verify it in the next step.
For tutorial purpose, you can only see ELF assets in A Chain
Please choose your mnemonic phrase in correct order to confirm your backup.
We highly recommend you write the Mnemonic phrase (Backup Phrase) on paper and keep it in a safe place, anyone get it can access or spend your assets.

Your password is used to encrypt and protect your private key and transactions, so the strength of the password is very important. aelf Wallet does not keep your password and cannot help you retrieve it. Please remember your password and keep it safe.

Mnemonic phrase can be used to recover your assets when you forget password, delete the app or lose your phone.\n\nWe highly recommend you write the Mnemonic phrase (Backup Phrase) on paper and keep it in a safe place, anyone get can access or spend your assets. Please don’t save them on any cloud drive or share via the internet.
When turned on, assets and balance in your wallet will be hidden
We prepared an easy tutorial for you to learn quicker.
Assets from Chain 1 has arrived, please confirm.
Notice: This address only support receiving from ELF. Please don’t use other coins!
Anyone who has your mnemonic phrase can access your assets directly.
Please write down the mnemonic phrase in order on paper carefully. If your phone is lost, stolen or damaged, mnemonic phrase can be used to recover your assets.
Save your mnemonic phrase offline and keep it safe. Do not store or tell anyone about your Keystore via any public network, including email, photos, or social media.
Save your Keystore offline and keep it safe. Do not store or tell anyone about your Keystore via any public network, including email, photos, or social media.
Please be sure to keep your Keystore in a safe place. If your phone is lost, stolen or damaged, the Keystore can be used to retrieve your assets.
Anyone who has your Keystore can access your assets directly.
Please position QR code in frame
Please save your QR code properly. If your phone is lost, stolen or damaged, QR Code could recover your assets.
Having your private keys means having all your wallet assets.
Please write down your private key on paper carefully. If your phone is lost, stolen, or damaged, the private key can be used to recover your assets.
Save your private key offline and keep it safe. Do not store or tell anyone about your Keystore via any public network, including email, photos, or social media.
Please do not save it to your email, notepad, cloud drive, chat tools, etc. which may put your assets at risk.
Do not transfer through network tools, once obtained by hackers will cause irreparable loss of assets. Offline devices are recommended to be transmitted by scanning qr code.
The picture does not contain a QR code!

You haven't backed up your mnemonic phrase. Please backup now! The mnemonic phrase is used for recovering your assets in case you forget your password, accidentally delete the wallet or lose your phone.
All wallet data will be deleted after you log out. Please confirm that you have backed up your wallet.

Your wallet password will be encrypted and stored in the Keystore of your mobile device, biometrics (fingerprint or facial ) will decrypt the password for transaction execution \n\nPlease backup the password immediately after enabling biometric verification feature. To reset the password, you can reimport the wallet using Mnemonic Phrase or Private Key.

Please check on the security level of your mobile device\'s biometric verification feature. For large asset transfers, please execute by manually inputting your password. \n\nPlease refrain from enabling biometric verification for shared mobile devices

The security levels for biometric verification vary among mobile devices, user are recommended to proceed with caution. imToken will not be held liable for any risks or loss arising from vulnerabilities in the biometric verification feature.
Please set the password for lock first.
Please set up a fingerprint on your phone first
Keep the Keystore in a secure place off-line. Please do not share or save the mnemonic phrase in a public network, such as email, photo albums, social apps and such.
Please enter a password between 12-36 characters, containing upper and lower case letters, characters and numbers.
The password did not conform with the rules.

1. If you don’t have a wallet yet, follow the steps below to create one.
 Step 1: Tab “Create Wallet” and follow the instructions
 Step 2: After creating your wallet successfully, you'll get your mnemonic phrase, which is a human readable format of private keys without encryption. Anyone who has it can access your wallet. To keep your wallet secure, we advise you to write the mnemonic phrase down on paper or store it on U-disk or hard disk.
 2. If you already have a wallet, follow the steps below to import wallet.
 Step 1: Tab “Import Wallet”
 Step 2: Enter your mnemonic phrase or scan QR code to import your wallet.
 After scanning, you also need to enter your password. You can also reset your password when importing your wallet.
If you want to add more tokens in your asset list, click“+” to add tokens. Some of the mainstream tokens will appear here by default. You can search tokens and add them to the list.
If you forget your transaction password, you can import your wallet again via mnemonic phrase and set a new password.
4.How to use wallet to transfer/receive tokens?

You can choose a token in your asset list and click “Transfer” or “Receive”.\nTransfer: you can enter the receiver’s address by scanning the QR code on your phone or entering the address manually.\nReceive: you can receive tokens by scanning the QR code face to face, or share your QR code or receiver's address to the sender.
6.How to backup Mnemonic phrase, Keystore, Private Key and QR Code?

Mnemonic phrase is a human readable format of private keys without encryption. Anyone who has it can access your wallet. Please note that:
 a) After you've created your wallet, backup your mnemonic phrase immediately. We recommend you to write down the mnemonic phrase on paper and keep it safe. Please do NOT take screenshots!
 b) Make sure you backed up correctly and keep your mnemonic phrase safe. Do NOT send your mnemonic phrase to anyone!
 As a decentralized wallet, aelf Wallet does not store users’ wallet mnemonic phrase. It is only stored on users' original devices through encryption. Follow the steps below to backup your mnemonic phrase.
 “My Account”——Profile photo——Select "Export Mnemonic Phrase/Keystore/Private Key/QR Code"——Enter transaction password——Backup (please keep it safe)
Please enter a valid email address.
Please read and agree with the Terms of Service
Please describe the issue in details and submit your wallet address and tx hash in text format. Do not submit your mnemonic phrase, Keystore or private key to us!
Cross-chain transfer detected, please use password to sign.
%2$s on %1$s is not enough to pay the fee, please recharge and try again
You need to re-sign transaction to initiate a transfer
Recipient\'s address cannot be the same as sender\'s address
Getting your wallet QR code means getting all your wallet assets, and you can recover your identity with the wallet QR code and wallet password!

The page you are visiting will jump to a third-party DApp "%1$s"

Tip: the page you are visiting will jump to a third-party DApp "%1$s" . All actions you do on a third party DApp will be subject to the user agreement and privacy policy of that third party DApp, and %1$s shall be directly and solely liable to you.
Before the wallet application is closed, DApp can automatically complete the whitelist operation without the need to confirm the pop-up window.
Chain %1$s to chain %2$s transfer %3$s in the transformation, please look forward to the release of the new version of aelf

For cross-chain transfers, you need to change the suffix to the receiver's address to the specified chain ID.\n For example:\n If the address is ELF_addressA_AELF, and you need to transfer the token to the account of tDVV chain, then you have to change the address to ELF_addressA_tDVV and follow the instructions to complete the transfer.
Please be careful. If you forget your password, all wallet data will be deleted. You can only recover your identity via mnemonic phrase and private key.
Are you sure you want to turn off biometrics? After closing, you need to enter the password for each payment
Keystore file is not included in the QR code
是否允许使用生物识别
Do you want to allow \"AELF Wallet\" to use biometrics? Using biometrics can be applied to unlock apps and verify payments
